home.title: Web & Mobile apps Design & Development company

about.title: What is appio?
about.introduction: Appio brings together a community of software developers & architects, and partners with other experts in the industry to provide you with the best team to help you transform your idea into a powerful and scalable product.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Our web designers and developers are dedicated to creating powerful, effective and engaging websites. Our bold and ultra-clean design style combine to produce high quality products.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Our mobile app developers have over a decade-long expertise in building solutions that meet market needs, empower companies’ brand identity, and encourage business growth and expansion.

qa.title: Automation & Testing
qa.description: Our software quality department handles functional, performance and compatibility testing, as well as translation and localization. Also we offer process automation solutions.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Our designers create visually appealing, elegant prototypes, easy to use and oriented to the target audience of your business. We optimize the design to efficiently organize the information to the user.

service.title: What can appio do?
service.description1: With appio you can create beautiful and elegant websites and apps that suits your business.
service.description2: Whether you go native, cross-platform, or web, we’re sure that we can create something ideal for you. Our goal is to make your vision a reality.

features.title: Software Features
features.description: Appio offers a variety of design and development services, from creating software development solutions and responsive designs, to building custom experiences using the latest and proven technologies.

who.title: Who we are
who.description1: Appio is a software development company that provides businesses worldwide with custom technology solutions. We help clients through all or parts of the Software Development Lifecycle. (SDLC).
who.description2: Appio brings together a community of software developers & architects, and partners with other experts in the industry to provide you with the best team to help you transform your idea into a powerful and scalable product.
who.description3: Whether you go native, cross-platform, or web, we’re sure that we can create something ideal for you. Our goal is to make your vision a reality.

team.title: Meet our board

projects.title: Our customers
projects.description: Check appio's portfolio and our full variety of success stories

list.title: Stuff
list.description: Stuff allows users to truly own what they buy, letting them to sell and purchase music, videos, podcasts, movies, and more, ensuring creators receive a fair share from their art.

list.title: Book
list.description: Book is a Web3 marketplace for buying, reading, and selling eBooks and Audiobooks. Readers can now buy and truly own their eBooks and Audiobooks and sell them on secondary marketplaces.

list.title: Polygon ID
list.description: Polygon ID is a self-sovereign private identity solution. Is a blockchain-native identity system with programmable privacy that empowers people and enables the creation of trusted interactions with web3 services thanks to the Zero Knowledge Proofs technology.

list.title: Hermez
list.description: Hermez is an open-source zero knowledge rollup optimised for secure, low-cost and usable token transfers on the wings of Ethereum. The Hermez Network uses zk-rollups, a technology that aggregates multiple transactions into a single proof, reducing the load on the Ethereum mainnet. By leveraging this technology, Hermez aims to provide a scalable and secure solution for decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, token transfers, and more.

list.title: Cinesa App
list.description: The Cinesa app offers a seamless movie-going experience. Users can easily browse through a comprehensive list of films, check showtimes, and book tickets with just a few taps. The app also provides detailed information about each movie, including trailers, cast members, and reviews, helping users make informed choices. Additionally, Cinesa app users can explore exclusive promotions, discounts, and loyalty programs, making their cinema experience even more enjoyable.

list.title: Iden3 Wallet
list.description: iden3 is a project that aims to create a censorship-resistant identity system. It focuses on developing technologies such as zkSNARKs (zero-knowledge succinct non-interactive arguments of knowledge) and Merkle trees to enable secure and privacy-preserving digital identities. The project provides tools like the circom compiler, which is used to generate zero-knowledge proofs, and offers a library called circomLib that contains parameterizable circuits that can be used to build complex circuits. With its mission to create an accessible and secure identity system, iden3 is at the forefront of research and development in this field.

list.title: Appio Web
list.description: Appio is a software development company that provides businesses worldwide with custom technology solutions. We help clients through all or parts of the Software Development Lifecycle. Our team of skilled developers is dedicated to creating mobile applications with a strong architectural foundation. We follow clean architecture principles, ensuring that our solutions are modular, maintainable, and scalable.
